thread.section_title: Kimpton Muse Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: The best
thread.title_full: The best - Review of Kimpton Muse Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: AlanJHoop
title: The best
text:
I've been to New York countless times and stayed in various hotels and apartments. I have also stayed at some of the best hotels in the world.
The Muse is a small boutique hotel on 46th, 5 minutes from Times Square but don't imagine this is a touristy hotel, it is perfectly situated and the casual friendly foyer, reception, bar, restaurant and staff make for a great business or city break.
My wife and I are in New York 5-6 times a year and this is our 1st choice.
Thanks to all staff.
